answer:
The Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him) made the Hijra to Medina from Makkah in the month of Rabƒ´ ø al-Awwal, which corresponds to September of the year 622 CE. The specific date is not definitively established, but it is often associated with the twelfth of Rabƒ´ ø al-Awwal. 

Allah And His Messenger know best (I couldn't find the answer in Shaykh Yasir Qadhi's videos).
